DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study represent initial foray deliver home-based individually-tailored physical activity intervention cancer risk reduction among African American woman Deep South .
DOC.brief_title: Home-based , Individually-tailored Physical Activity Print Intervention African American Women Deep South
DOC.detailed_description: 80 woman receive HIPP Intervention Wellness Contact Control . While main outcome focus feasibility acceptability , physical activity , fitness , body weight composition data collect baseline , 6 month , 12 month , along blood draw . HIPP Intervention : The physical activity intervention base Social Cognitive Theory Transtheoretical Model , emphasize behavioral strategy increase activity level ( i.e. , goal-setting , self-monitoring , problem-solving barrier , increase social support , reward oneself meet physical activity goal ) , include regular mailing ( three mailing month 1 , two mailing month 2 3 , one mailing month 4 , 5 , 6 , 8 , 10 ) physical activity manual match participant 's current level motivational readiness individually-tailored computer expert system feedback report . Computer expert system feedback report base participant ' monthly update survey data include information : 1. current stage motivational readiness physical activity ; 2. increase self- efficacy ( i.e. , confidence ) physical activity participation ; 3. weigh pro con engage physical activity ( decisional balance ) ; 4. social support family friends physical activity participation ; 5. outcome expectation ( belief regard consequence physical activity participation ) ; 6. perceive enjoyment physical activity ; 7. participant compare prior response ( progress feedback ) ; 8. participant compare individual physically active national guideline ( normative feedback ) ; 9. self monitor physical activity behavior ( use pedometer activity log track total step minute moderate intensity physical activity per day ) . The computer expert system draw bank 330 message address different level psychosocial environmental factor affect physical activity . Intervention participant also receive tip sheet address physical activity barrier specific African American woman Deep South ( identify focus group comprehensive literature review ) . Wellness Contact Control Condition : Cancer prevention information topic physical activity ( e.g. , `` Add Fruits Veggies Your Diet '' ) American Cancer Society ( ACS ) website ( www.cancer.org ) mail control participant time point HIPP Intervention participant receive physical activity intervention material .
